com.illcode.meterman.impl

Class BaseEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.impl.BaseEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Door, TalkingEntity

    public class BaseEntity
extends Object
implements Entity
    An Entity implementation that supports various standard features, and can be used as a starting point for more game-specific subclasses.

        public String getIndefiniteArticle()
        Description copied from interface: Entity

      • getListName

        public String getListName()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Returns the name of the entity that should be displayed in the room or inventory list. This may include any modifiers, like "(worn)", or "(equipped)".
        Specified by:
        getListName in interface Entity

      • lookInRoom

        public void lookInRoom()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Called on each entity in a room when a look command is issued. While the implementation is free to do anything, generally it will call GameManager.queueLookText(String, boolean) to add text to the room description printed.
        Specified by:
        lookInRoom in interface Entity

      • enterScope

        public void enterScope()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Called when the entity enters scope. This can occur when:
        1. The player moves into the room where this entity resides
        2. The entity is added to the current room
        3. The entity is added to the player inventory from somewhere outside the current room
        Specified by:
        enterScope in interface Entity

      • exitingScope

        public void exitingScope()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Called when the entity is exiting scope. This can occur when:
        1. The player is exiting the room where the entity resides
        2. The entity is being moved from the current room to somewhere other than the player's inventory
        3. The entity is being moved from the player's inventory to somewhere other than the current room
        Note that this method is called before any of the above actions take place, so it still has a valid place in the world graph.
        Specified by:
        exitingScope in interface Entity

      • taken

        public void taken()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Called when the entity is moved to the player inventory
        Specified by:
        taken in interface Entity

      • dropped

        public void dropped()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Called when the entity is removed from the player inventory
        Specified by:
        dropped in interface Entity

      • selected

        public boolean selected()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Called when the entity is selected in the UI.

        Note that it is called after the UI is updated as normal for the entity, so this method can modify it if desired.

        Specified by:
        selected in interface Entity
        Returns:
        true if selection listeners should be skipped, false to continue processing.

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Returns the room where this entity is found. If the entity is held in player inventory, this returns the current player room.
        Specified by:
        getRoom in interface Entity
        Returns:
        the room, or null if not in a room or inventory

      • setRoom

        public void setRoom(Room room)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Sets the room where this entity resides, or null if it doesn't reside anywhere.
        Specified by:
        setRoom in interface Entity

      • getActions

        public List<String> getActions()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Returns a list of extra actions to be shown in the UI. Never returns null.
        Specified by:
        getActions in interface Entity

      • processAction

        public boolean processAction(String action)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        The player invoked an action on this entity from the UI
        Specified by:
        processAction in interface Entity
        Parameters:
        action - action name
        Returns:
        true if the entity processed the action itself, false to continue through the processing chain

      • replaceParserMessage

        public String replaceParserMessage(String action)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Normally the GameManager prints a parser-like message when an action is performed, like "> TAKE CLOAK". An entity can request that this parser message replaced with its own message, or suppressed entirely.
        Specified by:
        replaceParserMessage in interface Entity
        Parameters:
        action - the action that is being performed
        Returns:
        null to allow the normal parser message flow to continue, "" to suppress the parser message entirely, or a non-empty string to replace the default parser message.

      • getProperties

        public Map<String,Object> getProperties()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Returns a modifiable Map that can be used to store arbitrary data useful for custom processing.
        Specified by:
        getProperties in interface Entity

      • setDelegate

        public void setDelegate(EntityDelegate delegate)
        Set an EntityDelegate to proxy certain method calls for this BaseEntity.
        Parameters:
        delegate - delegate to set, or null to remove proxying
